message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $130. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $125. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above that price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $115?
I've already gone as low as I can, Bob. I'm not willing to sell the product for anything less than $125. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm going to have to consider other options.
